welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yogyakarta, the heart of Javanese culture and home to stunning temples like Borobudur and Prambanan. We hope you enjoy exploring our city's rich history, vibrant arts scene, and delicious cuisine. Have a wonderful time discovering all that Yogyakarta has to offer!

restaurants.name: Sate Ayam Podomoro
restaurants.description: Sate Ayam Podomoro is a asian restaurant located in Yogyakarta.
restaurants.address: Jalan Mataram No. 11 (Jl.Mataram), Yogyakarta, DI Yogyakarta

restaurants.name: Lumpia Hotel Mutiara

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Yogyakarta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights and equipped with modern facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
